resources.string: 2. What is the value of the expression 1+3 * 4-2 ?
3.Nada started with 11 toy cars and added 4 more every week until he had 43 altogether. How many weeks did that take?
4. Harare, Zimbabwe is due South of Cairo, Egypt. What direction is Cairo, Egypt from Harare, Zimbabw
5. A TV costs three hundred and twelve dollar and forty cents. Write this amount in numbers using dollars and decimals of a dollar.
6. Arrange these in order from least price to greatest price ?
A. Coffee, Burger, Soda, Onion ring
B. Onion ring, Soda, Coffee, Burger
C. Onion ring, Soda, Burger, Coffee
D. Onion ring, Burger, Soda, Coffee
7. Which of the following integers are multiples of both 2 and 3? Indicate all such integers
